attributes.action: force Somerset County council to allow a referendum on proposals to create a single unitary "super-size" council in Somerset.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Somerset county council wants to  create a single unitary "super-size" council saying it will be more democratic, save money and improve services. It would be even more democratic if allowed the electorate of somerset to vote on the proposal.
